import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem integral_uniform_converges {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [CompleteSpace E] [NormedSpace ℝ E]
  {F_n : ℕ → ℝ → E} {F : ℝ → E} {a b : ℝ} (hab : a ≤ b)
  (h_uniform_conv : TendstoUniformlyOn F_n F atTop (Set.Icc a b))
  (hF_integrable : ∀ n, IntegrableOn (F_n n) (Set.Icc a b) volume)
  (hF_integrable_limit : IntegrableOn F (Set.Icc a b) volume) :
  ∫ x in Set.Icc a b, F x ∂volume = Tendsto.lim (tendsto_integral_of_tendstoUniformlyOn h_uniform_conv hF_integrable hF_integrable_limit) := by sorry

proof_steps.natural_language:
We assume:
• The functions $F$ and $F_n$ for all $n$ are integrable on the interval $[a,b]$ [tc_2].
Therefore, we conclude:
• For each $n$, $\left|\int_a^b F_n(x)\,dx - \int_a^b F(x)\,dx\right| \le \int_a^b |F_n(x) - F(x)|\,dx$ [l1].

proof_steps.natural_language:
We assume:
• The sequence of functions $\{F_n\}$ converges uniformly to a function $F$ on the interval $S=[a,b]$ [tc_1].
• The functions $F$ and $F_n$ for all $n$ are integrable on the interval $[a,b]$ [tc_2].
Therefore, we conclude:
• For each $n$, $\int_a^b |F_n(x) - F(x)|\,dx \le (b-a) \|F_n - F\|_S$, where $\|g\|_S = \sup_{x \in S} |g(x)|$ is the supremum norm [l2].

• The sequence of functions $\{F_n\}$ converges uniformly to a function $F$ on the interval $S=[a,b]$ [tc_1].
Therefore, we conclude:
• $\lim_{n\to\infty} \|F_n - F\|_S = 0$ [l3].

proof_steps.natural_language:

• For each $n$, $\int_a^b |F_n(x) - F(x)|\,dx \le (b-a) \|F_n - F\|_S$ [l2].
• $\lim_{n\to\infty} \|F_n - F\|_S = 0$ [l3].
Therefore, we conclude:
• $\int_a^b F(x)\,dx=\lim_{n\to\infty}\int_a^b F_n(x)\,dx$ [ts_1].

import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem integral_uniform_converges {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [CompleteSpace E] [NormedSpace ℝ E]
  {F_n : ℕ → ℝ → E} {F : ℝ → E} {a b : ℝ} (hab : a ≤ b)
